Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: She was me father's boat... Served him well for over 50 years.
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 這是我父親的船……陪他度了 50 多年。

Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: But now she can barely stay afloat.
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 不過現在連浮在水面上都很吃力。

Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: I'd repair her myself, but I don't have the right materials, lad.
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 我想親自去修，但是沒有適合的材料，小子。

Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: I'd repair her myself, but I don't have the right materials, miss.
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 我想親自去修，但是沒有合適的材料，姑娘。

Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: Aye... 200 pieces of hardwood to patch the hull would be a good start.
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 唉……我們要先用 200 塊硬木用來把船體修好。

Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: But we'll also need to get the ticket machine back up, and the iridium anchor repaired.
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 不過之後還得修好售票機，還有銥錨。

Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: If I could get me hands on the right materials, and repair the ol' girl... well, then I could take you to the Fern Islands.
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 如果你能幫我找來適合的材料，讓我好修理這艘船……嗯，那我就可以帶你去芬恩島。

Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: Volcanic islands full of strange parrots, they say...
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 據說有火山島嶼，上面有好多奇怪的鸚鵡……

Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: Aye... I thought you would, lad.
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 好耶……我就知道你會幫忙的，小子。

Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: Aye... I thought you would, miss.
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 好耶……我就知道你會幫忙的，姑娘。

Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: I'll leave this door unlocked for ya... you can come drop off the materials whenever you like.
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 這扇門我就不鎖了……你收集好材料之後可以隨時來這裡擺好。

Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?: If you have a change of heart, you can always come back and help out. I'll leave this door unlocked, anyhow.
唉……挺慘的，對吧？: 如果你改變主意了，可以來這裡幫忙。我還是把這扇門開著。
